Title: Authorizes Alyssa and Adam Borg to file a late application for a STAR real property tax exemption
Summary: Authorizes Alyssa and Adam Borg to file a late application with Nassau county for a STAR real property tax exemption; authorizes a refund of taxes paid.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Alyssa and Adam Borg to file a late application for a STAR real property tax exemption
